tlabel: Assets
doc: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

tlabel: Accumulated deficit

tlabel: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
doc: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

tlabel: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
doc: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries

tlabel: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current

plabel_variations: "Deferred revenue" (530x) | "Contract liabilities" (256x) | "Customer deposits" (67x)

tlabel: Costs and Expenses
doc: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

plabel_variations: "Total operating expenses" (416x) | "Total costs and expenses" (282x) | "Total expenses" (179x)

tlabel: Accrued Liabilities, Current
doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).
example_companies: AMAZON COM INC, VALERO ENERGY CORP/TX, WESTERN DIGITAL CORP
plabel_variations: "Accrued expenses" (960x) | "Accrued liabilities" (651x) | "Accrued expenses and other current liabilities" (272x)

tlabel: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
doc: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.
example_companies: SMARTFINANCIAL INC., DIVERSIFIED HEALTHCARE TRUST, ULTRA CLEAN HOLDINGS, INC.
plabel_variations: "Repurchase of common stock (in shares)" (77x) | "Repurchases of common stock (in shares)" (46x) | "Repurchase of common stock, shares" (21x)

tlabel: Investment Income, Operating, Tax Expense (Benefit)
doc: Amount of tax expense (benefit) on investment income classified as operating. Excludes realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.
example_companies: ARES CAPITAL CORP, BARINGS BDC, INC., GOLUB CAPITAL BDC, INC.
plabel_variations: "Excise tax expense" (12x) | "Income tax expense (benefit), including excise tax expense (benefit)" (7x) | "Income tax expense, including excise tax" (5x)

tlabel: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Interest Receivable, Net
doc: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from borrowers for interest payments.

tlabel: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
doc: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

tlabel: Increase/(decrease) in accounts payable

tlabel: Restricted Cash

Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so
example_companies: MIDCAP FINANCIAL INVESTMENT CORP, GOLUB CAPITAL BDC, INC., TELADOC HEALTH, INC.

tlabel: Proceeds from Long-Term Lines of Credit

tlabel: Long-Term Line of Credit
doc: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specif
example_companies: PROSPECT CAPITAL CORP, BARINGS BDC, INC., NEW MOUNTAIN FINANCE CORP
plabel_variations: "Revolving credit facility" (21x) | "Credit facility" (15x) | "Line of credit" (12x)

tlabel: Repayments of Long-Term Lines of Credit

tlabel: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
doc: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of change

tlabel: Equity Method Investments
doc: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

tlabel: Secured Debt
doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.
example_companies: SMARTFINANCIAL INC., RITHM CAPITAL CORP., AB PRIVATE CREDIT INVESTORS CORP
plabel_variations: "Mortgage notes payable, net" (11x) | "Mortgages payable, net" (9x) | "Secured borrowings" (6x)

tlabel: Restructuring Charges
doc: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.
example_companies: COINBASE GLOBAL, INC., LINDE PLC, BRIDGEBIO PHARMA, INC.
plabel_variations: "Restructuring charges" (75x) | "Restructuring" (45x) | "Restructuring costs" (38x)

tlabel: Property and equipment - at cost
doc: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.
example_companies: ALCOA CORP, CRANE CO, SENSIENT TECHNOLOGIES CORP
plabel_variations: "Property, plant and equipment" (43x) | "Property and equipment" (15x) | "Property and equipment, at cost" (15x)

tlabel: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
doc: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.
example_companies: AMAZON COM INC, PALANTIR TECHNOLOGIES INC., ECHOSTAR CORP
plabel_variations: "Purchases of marketable securities" (207x) | "Purchase of marketable securities" (84x) | "Investment in marketable securities" (19x)

tlabel: Unsecured Debt
doc: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).
example_companies: PROSPECT CAPITAL CORP, NEW MOUNTAIN FINANCE CORP, RITHM CAPITAL CORP.
plabel_variations: "Unsecured term loans, net" (6x) | "Term loans, net" (5x) | "Unsecured senior notes, net" (5x)

tlabel: Proceeds from Issuance of Unsecured Debt
doc: The cash inflow from the issuance of long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt unsecured debt.
example_companies: PROSPECT CAPITAL CORP, NEW MOUNTAIN FINANCE CORP, MATADOR RESOURCES CO
most_common_plabel: Proceeds from issuance of senior unsecured notes
plabel_variations: "Proceeds from issuance of senior unsecured notes" (6x) | "Proceeds from Issuance of Unsecured Debt" (3x) | "Proceeds from term loan" (3x)

tlabel: Trustee Fees
doc: Fees charged annually for the professional services of a trustee, usually quoted as a percentage of the funds being managed. The fee for appointing an offshore Trustee is included in the trust price.
example_companies: BLACKSTONE SECURED LENDING FUND, BLACKSTONE PRIVATE CREDIT FUND, APOLLO DEBT SOLUTIONS BDC
plabel_variations: "Trustees' fees" (9x) | "Board of Trustees fees" (5x) | "Trustees fees" (4x)

tlabel: Payments to Acquire Investments
doc: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.
example_companies: JAZZ PHARMACEUTICALS PLC, COSMOS HEALTH INC., MADISON SQUARE GARDEN SPORTS CORP.
plabel_variations: "Purchases of investments" (136x) | "Purchase of investments" (54x) | "Investment of cash in Trust Account" (18x)

tlabel: Other Receivables
doc: Amount due from parties in nontrade transactions, classified as other.
example_companies: PROSPECT CAPITAL CORP, NEW MOUNTAIN FINANCE CORP, AB PRIVATE CREDIT INVESTORS CORP
plabel_variations: "Other receivables" (50x) | "Other receivable" (22x) | "Due from related parties" (17x)

tlabel: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, Tax
doc: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.
example_companies: SMARTFINANCIAL INC., LINDE PLC, AT&T INC.
most_common_plabel: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, Tax
plabel_variations: "Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, Tax" (12x) | "Tax effect" (8x) | "Qualifying hedges, reclassification adjustment, tax" (4x)

tlabel: Investment Company, Financial Support to Investee Contractually Required, Amount
doc: Amount of financial support committed by investment company to investee that is contractually required.
example_companies: MIDCAP FINANCIAL INVESTMENT CORP, PROSPECT CAPITAL CORP, ARES CAPITAL CORP
plabel_variations: "Total Commitment" (2x) | "Uncommitted funds" (2x) | "Total commitments" (1x)

tlabel: Investment, Interest Rate, Paid in Cash
doc: Rate of interest paid in cash on investment.
example_companies: MIDCAP FINANCIAL INVESTMENT CORP, MONROE CAPITAL CORP, BAIN CAPITAL SPECIALTY FINANCE, INC.
most_common_plabel: Investment, interest rate, paid in cash
plabel_variations: "Investment, interest rate, paid in cash" (7x) | "Interest rate, cash" (5x) | "Interest Rate, Cash" (3x)

tlabel: Amortization Of Offering Costs
doc: Amortization Of Offering Costs
example_companies: BLACKSTONE PRIVATE CREDIT FUND, BLUE OWL CREDIT INCOME CORP., APOLLO DEBT SOLUTIONS BDC
plabel_variations: "Amortization of offering costs" (12x) | "Amortization of deferred offering costs" (3x)

tlabel: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Subsidiary Equity Issuance
doc: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.
example_companies: VALERO ENERGY CORP/TX, MATADOR RESOURCES CO, RITHM CAPITAL CORP.
plabel_variations: "Contributions from noncontrolling interests" (30x) | "Contributions" (13x) | "Contributions from non-controlling interests" (5x)

tlabel: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Gain (Loss)
doc: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).
example_companies: DIVERSIFIED HEALTHCARE TRUST, ALNYLAM PHARMACEUTICALS, INC., PALANTIR TECHNOLOGIES INC.
most_common_plabel: Change in fair value of equity securities
plabel_variations: "Change in fair value of equity securities" (8x) | "Fair value adjustment on marketable equity securities, net" (4x) | "Gain on investment in equity securities" (3x)

tlabel: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest
doc: Amount after income tax of income (loss) including the portion attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest. Excludes the portion attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest recognized as temporary equity.
example_companies: GENERAC HOLDINGS INC., UBER TECHNOLOGIES, INC, MADISON SQUARE GARDEN SPORTS CORP.
plabel_variations: "Net income (loss)" (60x) | "Net income" (38x) | "Net loss" (14x)

tlabel: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Business
doc: Amount of gain (loss) from sale and disposal of integrated set of activities and assets capable of being conducted and managed for purpose of providing return in form of dividend, lower cost, or other economic benefit to investor, owner, member and participant.
example_companies: WESTERN DIGITAL CORP, REPAY HOLDINGS CORP, VONTIER CORP
plabel_variations: "Gain on sale of business" (30x) | "Loss on sale of business" (11x) | "Gain on sale of divested business" (7x)

tlabel: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Period Increase (Decrease)
doc: The increase (decrease) during the period in the number of shares issued.
example_companies: EVEREST GROUP, LTD., GOLUB CAPITAL BDC, INC., NEW MOUNTAIN FINANCE CORP
plabel_variations: "Net increase in Shares" (10x) | "Net Change in Shareholders' Equity, shares" (8x) | "Total increase (decrease) common stock, outstanding (in shares)" (4x)

tlabel: Fee And Other Income
doc: Fee And Other Income
example_companies: BARINGS BDC, INC., BARINGS CAPITAL INVESTMENT CORP, FRANKLIN BSP CAPITAL CORP
plabel_variations: "Total fee and other income" (3x) | "Fee and other income" (1x) | "Fees and other income" (1x)

tlabel: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Held-to-Maturity Securities
doc: The cash inflow associated with the maturity, prepayments and calls (requests for early payments) of debt securities designated as held-to-maturity.
example_companies: EVEREST GROUP, LTD., M&T BANK CORP, CHUBB LTD
plabel_variations: "Proceeds from paydowns and maturities" (4x) | "Proceeds from maturities of held-to-maturity securities" (4x) | "Principal repayments on securities held-to-maturity" (3x)

tlabel: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Current
doc: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI), classified as current.
example_companies: EVEREST GROUP, LTD., ALNYLAM PHARMACEUTICALS, INC., BRIDGEBIO PHARMA, INC.
plabel_variations: "Equity securities, at fair value" (28x) | "Equity securities" (23x) | "Marketable equity securities" (9x)

tlabel: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
doc: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.
example_companies: COSMOS HEALTH INC., FRANKLIN BSP CAPITAL CORP, M&T BANK CORP
plabel_variations: "Dividends paid on preferred stock" (32x) | "Preferred stock dividends paid" (18x) | "Cash dividends paid on preferred stock" (11x)

tlabel: Investment Company, Contractual Fee Waived
doc: Amount of fee contractually waived by investment company.
example_companies: GOLUB CAPITAL BDC, INC., NEW MOUNTAIN FINANCE CORP, BLACKSTONE SECURED LENDING FUND
plabel_variations: "Less: Waivers" (9x) | "Less: management fees waived (See Note 5)" (3x) | "Credits to base management fee  loan servicing fee" (2x)

tlabel: Derivative Asset, Current
doc: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.
example_companies: BARINGS BDC, INC., MATADOR RESOURCES CO, ALCOA CORP
plabel_variations: "Derivative assets" (23x) | "Derivative instruments" (14x) | "Current derivative assets" (7x)

tlabel: Long-Term Debt, Gross
doc: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.
example_companies: GOLUB CAPITAL BDC, INC., MONROE CAPITAL CORP, MONROE CAPITAL INCOME PLUS CORP
plabel_variations: "Debt" (7x) | "Principal amount" (2x) | "Debt outstanding" (1x)

tlabel: Investment Company, Voluntary Fee Waived
doc: Amount of fee voluntarily waived by investment company.

most_common_plabel: Credits to fees from Adviser - other
plabel_variations: "Credits to fees from Adviser - other" (2x) | "Expense waiver" (2x) | "Management fees waived" (2x)

tlabel: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Fair Value

plabel_variations: "Securities held to maturity, fair value" (15x) | "Securities held-to-maturity, fair value" (13x) | "Held-to-maturity securities, fair value" (12x)

doc: Incentive Fee Payable, Income

plabel_variations: "Income based incentive fees payable (Note 3)" (2x) | "Income based incentive fee payable" (1x) | "Income based incentive fees payable" (1x)

tlabel: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, before Tax
doc: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.

most_common_plabel: Unrealized gain on pension plan obligation
plabel_variations: "Unrealized gain on pension plan obligation" (2x) | "Total Benefit Plans" (2x) | "(Increase) decrease in accumulated post-retirement benefits obligation, net of reclassification adjustments" (1x)

tlabel: Interest and Dividend Income, Securities, Operating
doc: Amount of operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities.

tlabel: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount (Premium) and Debt Issuance Costs, Net
doc: Amount of unamortized debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

tlabel: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Tax
doc: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

plabel_variations: "Foreign currency translation adjustment" (45x) | "Foreign currency translation adjustments" (19x) | "Foreign currency translation adjustments, tax" (13x)

tlabel: Increase (Decrease) in Dividends Receivable

plabel_variations: "(Increase) decrease in dividends receivable" (9x) | "Dividends from affiliates" (8x) | "Dividend receivable" (3x)

tlabel: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Acquisitions

doc: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. tlabel: Cash
doc: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

tlabel: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interests
doc: Carrying amount, attributable to parent and noncontrolling interests, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeem
example_companies: WESTERN DIGITAL CORP, UBER TECHNOLOGIES, INC, NEXTERA ENERGY INC

tlabel: Depreciation, Amortization and Accretion, Net
doc: The aggregate net amount of depreciation, amortization, and accretion recognized during an accounting period. As a noncash item, the net amount is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

tlabel: Increase (Decrease) in Receivables

tlabel: Restricted Cash, Current
doc: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

tlabel: Shares, Issued
doc: Number of shares of stock issued as of the balance sheet date, including shares that had been issued and were previously outstanding but which are now held in the treasury.

plabel_variations: "Balance, shares" (515x) | "Balance (in shares)" (124x) | "Ending balance (in shares)" (70x)

tlabel: Repayments of Short-Term Debt

tlabel: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Gain (Loss), before Reclassification and Tax
doc: Amount before tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

tlabel: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Asset
doc: Amount of increase (decrease) in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

tlabel: Interest Expense, Debt

tlabel: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases
doc: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other rev

tlabel: Repayments of Unsecured Debt

tlabel: Repayments of Convertible Debt
doc: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

tlabel: Research and Development Expense (Excluding Acquired in Process Cost)
doc: The costs incurred in a planned search or critical investigation aimed at discovery of new knowledge with the hope that such knowledge will be useful in developing a new product or service, a new process or technique, or in bringing about a significant improvement to an existing product or process; or to translate research findings or other knowledge into a plan or design for a new product or process or for a significant improvement to an existing product or process whether intended for sale or
example_companies: WESTERN DIGITAL CORP, JAZZ PHARMACEUTICALS PLC, GILEAD SCIENCES, INC.

tlabel: Business Combination, Acquisition Related Costs
doc: This element represents acquisition-related costs incurred to effect a business combination which costs have been expensed during the period. Such costs include finder's fees; advisory, legal, accounting, valuation, and other professional or consulting fees; general administrative costs, including the costs of maintaining an internal acquisitions department; and may include costs of registering and issuing debt and equity securities.

tlabel: Restricted Cash, Noncurrent

tlabel: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, before Tax

tlabel: Amortization Of Deferred Financing Costs

tlabel: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Noncurrent

Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes

tlabel: Conversion of Stock, Amount Converted
doc: The value of the stock converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

doc: Amount of expense for shareholder services. Includes, but is not limited to, fee and expense for transfer and dividend disbursing agent.

tlabel: Debt, Long-Term and Short-Term, Combined Amount

tlabel: Excise and Sales Taxes
doc: The amount of excise and sales taxes included in sales and revenues, which are then deducted as a cost of sales. Includes excise taxes, which are applied to specific types of transactions or items (such as gasoline or alcohol); and sales, use and value added taxes, which are applied to a broad class of revenue-producing transactions involving a wide range of goods and services.

tlabel: Convertible notes payable

tlabel: Proceeds from Principal Repayment, Loan and Lease, Held-for-Investment

doc: Amount excluding accrued interest, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

tlabel: Deferred Revenue, Noncurrent

tlabel: Accrued Liabilities and Other Liabilities, Current
doc: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid nor invoiced, and liabilities classified as other. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

most_common_plabel: Accrued expenses and other current liabilities
plabel_variations: "Accrued expenses and other current liabilities" (47x) | "Accrued and other current liabilities" (7x) | "Accrued expenses and other liabilities" (7x)

tlabel: Increase Decrease In Directors Fees Payable
doc: Amount of expenses related to the directors' fees which are fees paid by an Entity to its directors. Directors' fees may be paid in addition to salary and other benefits.

tlabel: Subordinated Debt
doc: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of subordinated debt (with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

tlabel: Intangible Assets, Net (Including Goodwill)
doc: Carrying amount of finite-lived intangible assets, indefinite-lived intangible assets and goodwill. Goodwill is an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized. Intangible assets are assets, not including financial assets, lacking physical substance.
example_companies: COSMOS HEALTH INC., CARLYLE GROUP INC.
plabel_variations: "Goodwill and intangible assets, net" (31x) | "Intangible assets, net" (30x) | "Goodwill and other intangible assets, net" (28x)

tlabel: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities, Current
doc: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer), including liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits.

doc: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of or advances to an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, and joint venture or equity method investment) or the acquisition of an additional interest in a subsidiary (controlled entity).

tlabel: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes
doc: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to taxing authorities for taxes that are based on the reporting entity's earnings, net of amounts receivable from taxing authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes, and in deferred and other tax liabilities and assets.

doc: Amount of tax expense (benefit), before reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

doc: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

doc: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date, whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

tlabel: Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
doc: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes purchases of participations in pools of securities that are subject to a resale agreement, assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

tlabel: Paid-in-Kind Interest
doc: Interest paid other than in cash for example by issuing additional debt securities. As a noncash item, it is added to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

tlabel: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Fixed Assets Acquired
doc: The amount of fixed assets that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

tlabel: Preferred Stock, Liquidation Preference Per Share
doc: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share.

tlabel: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Debt Assumed
doc: The amount of debt that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.
example_companies: GOLUB CAPITAL BDC, INC., RITHM CAPITAL CORP.
plabel_variations: "Debt" (2x) | "Related party loan assumed in Business Combination" (2x) | "Purchase Money Note as consideration for SVBB Acquisition" (2x)

tlabel: Asset Retirement Obligation, Accretion Expense
doc: Amount of accretion expense recognized during the period that is associated with an asset retirement obligation. Accretion expense measures and incorporates changes due to the passage of time into the carrying amount of the liability.

tlabel: Amortization of Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSRs)
doc: The periodic amortization (in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income or loss) of capitalized servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

tlabel: Interest and Other Income
doc: The amount of interest income and other income recognized during the period. Included in this element is interest derived from investments in debt securities, cash and cash equivalents, and other investments which reflect the time value of money or transactions in which the payments are for the use or forbearance of money and other income from ancillary business-related activities (that is, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

tlabel: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties
doc: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of real estate or properties that were intended to be sold or held for capital appreciation or rental income. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

tlabel: Derivative Asset, Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, before Offset

tlabel: Interest Expense, Deposits
doc: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all deposits.

tlabel: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Excluding Accrued Interest
doc: Amount excluding accrued interest, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Excluding Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
doc: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

tlabel: Time Deposits
doc: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.
plabel_variations: "Time deposits" (37x) | "Time" (35x) | "Certificates of deposit" (9x)

tlabel: Payments for (Proceeds from) Hedge, Financing Activities
doc: The net cash outflow or inflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either cash flow hedge, fair value hedge or hedge of net investment in foreign operations.

plabel_variations: "Upfront Payments/Receipts" (2x) | "Hedge settlements" (1x) | "Derivative contracts with financing element" (1x)

tlabel: Accounts Payable, Trade, Current
doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).
plabel_variations: "Trade accounts payable" (58x) | "Trade payables" (49x) | "Accounts payable" (38x)

tlabel: Asset, Held-for-Sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current
doc: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
example_companies: VONTIER CORP, PINNACLE WEST CAPITAL CORP
plabel_variations: "Assets held for sale" (64x) | "Current assets held for sale" (9x) | "Assets classified as held for sale" (5x)

tlabel: Dividends
doc: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind (PIK) dividends declared, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred stock.

tlabel: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification and Tax

plabel_variations: "Gains (losses) arising during the period" (3x) | "Unrealized gains (losses) arising during the period" (3x) | "Unrealized gain on cash flow hedge" (3x)

tlabel: Accounts Payable

tlabel: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Warrant Issued

tlabel: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
doc: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

plabel_variations: "Proceeds from issuance of preferred stock" (11x) | "Proceeds from sale of preferred stock" (8x) | "Issuance of preferred stock" (8x)

tlabel: Proceeds from Debt, Net of Issuance Costs
doc: The cash inflow from additional borrowings, net of cash paid to third parties in connection with debt origination.

plabel_variations: "Proceeds from borrowings" (3x) | "Proceeds from issuance of debt, net of issuance costs" (3x) | "Proceeds from debt, net of issuance costs" (2x)

tlabel: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
doc: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.
example_companies: ALTERNUS CLEAN ENERGY, INC., CRANE CO
most_common_plabel: Net cash used in investing activities from continuing operations
plabel_variations: "Net cash used in investing activities from continuing operations" (21x) | "Net cash used in investing activities of continuing operations" (13x) | "Net cash provided by investing activities - continuing operations" (10x)

tlabel: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
doc: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.
example_companies: ALTERNUS CLEAN ENERGY, INC., CRANE CO
most_common_plabel: Net cash used in operating activities from continuing operations
plabel_variations: "Net cash used in operating activities from continuing operations" (28x) | "Net cash used in operating activities - continuing operations" (18x) | "Net cash provided by operating activities from continuing operations" (16x)

tlabel: Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Discontinued Operations
doc: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of operating activities of discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

most_common_plabel: Net cash used in operating activities - discontinued operations
plabel_variations: "Net cash used in operating activities - discontinued operations" (21x) | "Net cash used in operating activities of discontinued operations" (14x) | "Net cash provided by operating activities from discontinued operations" (10x)

tlabel: Payments to Acquire Other Productive Assets

tlabel: Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Discontinued Operations
doc: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities of discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

most_common_plabel: Net cash used in investing activities - discontinued operations

tlabel: Unbilled Receivables, Current

tlabel: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Conversion of Units

tlabel: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax

tlabel: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
doc: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

tlabel: Payment for Pension and Other Postretirement Benefits

tlabel: Inventory, Work in Process, Net of Reserves
doc: Carrying amount, net of reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or goods which are partially completed. This inventory is generally comprised of raw materials, labor and factory overhead costs, which require further materials, labor and overhead to be converted into finished goods, and which generally require the use of estimates to determine percentage complete and pricing.
